snippet.title: Scorching Desert Game Trailer
snippet.description:
"Scorching Desert" is an upcoming Open-World-Survival-Crafting game, where you're lost in an ancient mythical desert, trying your best to survive, advance & uncover the desert's darkest secrets...

You wake up with nothing on you, but as you will soon realise, you better hurry up, build a shelter, scavenge food and find water. With your first shelter you're now ready to explore a massive 64km^2 desert landscape consisting of 8 unique desert biomes. On your way you will encounter various threats from wild animals to dangerous creatures & the elements themselves, all while uncovering a range of ancient mysteries.
You might even be strong enough to find a way out of the desert.... 
Or are you just hallucinating?

The last question remains:
Do you have what it takes to survive the Scorching Desert?

Wishlist Scorching Desert on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2625000?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=april2024&utm_medium=web

Support our efforts on Kickstarter:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1125440047/scorching-desert

Give us a follow us on Twitter(X):
https://x.com/ScorchingDesert/

Follow us on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61552081970620
